title: Write an upgradable NFT Market contract
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Implement an upgradable NFT market contract:
• Implement the first version of the contract consistent with [this challenge](https://decert.me/challenge/abdbc346-8314-4394-8f97-8732780602ed) logic.
• For the second version of the logic contract, add the method of offline signature listing NFT (signature content: tokenId, price), allowing users to use setApproveAll to the NFT market contract for one-time use, and each NFT only needs to be listed using the signature.

It needs to be deployed to the test network, open-sourced to the blockchain browser, and note the proxy contract and the addresses of the two implemented contracts in your Github Readme.md.

Please submit your Github repository address.

description: Understanding the writing of upgradable contracts, understanding the role of proxy contracts and implementation contracts, and how to upgrade contracts, and how to open source implementation contracts?
